international IRS officeTax topicsOther languagesPaperwork Reduction Action notice:The information collected will be used by the Internal Revenue Service to improve the Section 508 accessibility of the IRS website. Providing this information is voluntary.  An agency may not conduct or sponsor, and a person is not required to respond to, a collection of information unless it displays a valid control number assigned by OMB. The valid OMB control number for this information collection is 1545-2208.  The estimated burden associated with this collection of information is 5 minutes per response. There are no assurances of confidentiality. Comments concerning the accuracy of this burden estimate and suggestions for reducing this burden should be directed to the Internal Revenue Service, Online Services by submitting the field below.
